name: WWF Wrestlemania: Steel Cage Challenge
description:
The Sega version of WWF Wrestlemania: Steel Cage Challenge is different from its NES counterpart.

There are ten wrestlers to choose from:
  • Bret Hart
  • Hulk Hogan
  • Irwin R. Schyster
  • Papa Shango
  • Randy Savage
  • Ric Flair
  • Shawn Michaels
  • Tatanka
  • Ted Dibiase
  • The Undertaker
Each wrestler has a standard set of moves consisting of punching, kicking, body slams and turnbuckle manoeuvres, as well as a finishing move for every wrestler. There are three different game modes to choose from: Single (either regular or steel-cage), Tag Team and Championship.

releases.country: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, The Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

releases.publisher: Tec Toy Indústria de Brinquedos S.A.

shot.caption: Main Menu, picking the number of players
Picking the wrestler you want to play, I picked “The Undertaker”
The bell rings and the match starts
I am down early and Ric Flair is taking full advantage.
A bit of fighting outside of the ring. There is a 10 second limit outside before losing.
I was outside the ring for too long so my opponent Ric Flair won.
I won the rematch after pinning my opponent down for 3 seconds.
Start of a Steel Cage Match. No getting out of this one.
The CPU tags out as I ready myself to flatten my new opponent on a tag match.
OK this is going to hurt.
